articles.description: The Six Nations is set for a thrilling finale on 'Super Saturday' with four sides still in the running to win the title and Wales battling to avoid the Wooden Spoon.
articles.title: Six Nations: What's at stake on 'Super Saturday'?

articles.description: The woman who made accusations about Christian Horner's behaviour is to appeal against Red Bull's decision to dismiss her complaint.
articles.title: Christian Horner: Woman to appeal against Red Bull decision to dismiss complaint

articles.description: Aaron Donald, one of the NFL's greatest defensive players, announces his retirement with immediate effect.
articles.title: Aaron Donald: Los Angeles Rams defensive star announces retirement with immediate effect

articles.description: US Open champion Wyndham Clark holds a four-shot lead over Xander Schauffele and Nick Taylor with Matt Fitzpatrick one further back at the Players Championship.
articles.title: Players Championship: Wyndham Clark leads from Matt Fitzpatrick with Rory McIlroy in contention

articles.description: Arsenal have been drawn against Bayern Munich in the quarter-finals of the Champions League, while Manchester City will play Real Madrid.
articles.title: Arsenal draw Bayern & Man City face Real in quarters

articles.description: Man City make Bruno Guimaraes contact, Liverpool want Bayern's Jamal Musiala, Arsenal line up Braham Diaz move, plus more.
articles.title: Man City make Guimaraes contact - Saturday's gossip

articles.description: Jordan Spieth says players on the PGA Tour board are being "encouraged" to meet with Saudi Arabian PIF chiefs amid ongoing negotiations about a merger with LIV Golf.
articles.title: Jordan Spieth: PGA Tour player-directors being encouraged to meet Saudi PIF chiefs

articles.description: Liverpool will play Italian club Atalanta in the quarter-finals of the Europa League with West Ham taking on German side Bayer Leverkusen.
articles.title: Liverpool face Atalanta & West Ham draw Leverkusen

articles.description: Maria Sakkari beats US Open champion Coco Gauff to set up an Indian Wells final against world number one Iga Swiatek.
articles.title: Indian Wells: Maria Sakkari beats Coco Gauff to reach final against Iga Swiatek

articles.description: Chelsea manager Emma Hayes says she let herself down with her comments about relationships between players.
articles.title: 'I let myself down' - Hayes on relationship comments
